ygData.subject: Re: Missed notes
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with ya on this one. Again, I am usually afraid to bring something like this up for fear of being labelled Whiner or wanting my class to be
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with ya on this one. Again, I am usually afraid to bring something
like this up for fear of being labelled "Whiner" or wanting my class to be
uber-perfecto.

But, compared to the past, it seems like the past WEEK or so I have had so
many EMBARASSING missed notes, even on CHANT OF BATTLE!

Come on! =)

And, for the higher level brass songs... without a horn in my hand, it seems
almost IMPOSSIBLE to get them to start....

Tallonn - 38th verse
Bertox

-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim <kim@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, August 01, 1999 12:42 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Missed notes


>From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
>Has everyone else noticed that missed notes when starting a
>song is now annoying frequent? Not just with new songs
>either, I'm missing notes with low level songs like
>Accelerando and Hymn.
>
>One of the things I liked about EQ combat was (other than
>weaving songs) the lack of a twitch factor. If notes continue
>to be missed at this rate, coupled with all the resists which
>force you to retry the song (thus inviting more missed notes),
>I may just give up. If I wanted to play an arcade game, I
>would've bought a Playstation.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>
>
